dmca.title: U.K. Clinic Complains of Defamation on Badbusinessbureau.com
dmca.body:
In response to your email today regarding our request for removal of links, I am responding using the numbering scheme you have used:

1. All Google websites which can be read, accessed or downloaded in the United Kingdom (including, but not limited www.google.com. www.google.co.uk etc). The English courts exercise jurisdiction in all cases where the material is accessible in the United Kingdom regardless of whether the site is intended for the United Kingdom or not.

[redacted]
